public abstract class  OOBNSlot
     extends java.lang.Object

     public void display(JotUI, GrapherPanel);
     public abstract void display(JotUI, Frame, GrapherPanel);

A slot must be either a simple slot or a complex slot. All slots have a name and a set of parents. Their value types differ, though.
